greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table read by rows where T(0,0)=0; n-th row has 2^n terms T(n,j),j=0 to 2^n-1. T(n,T088208(n,j))=2^n-j, where T088208 is the table described in A088208.
comment: A Thue-Morse generator using the "Ordering of Iterates" algorithm.
reference: Manfred R. Schroeder, "Fractals, Chaos, Power Laws", W.H. Freeman, 1991, p. 282, 265.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 28 2003
ext: Edited by _Ray Chandler_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 08 2003
